Class FileObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • FileObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<FileObject>

    public class FileObject
extends Object
implements Comparable<FileObject>
    Represents a file, with methods that facilitates dealing with its meta-data, and comparison.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean exists
      Flag for the existence of the file.
      (package private) File file
      A File object representing the physical file.
      private Folder folder
      The folder containing the file.
      private String name
      Name of the file.
      private Path path
      Path of the file.
      private String[] pathArray
      Array representation of the file path; every level an entry in the array.
      private String pathString
      String representation of the file path.
      private long size
      Size of the file.
      private long timeStamp
      Date of the last file modification.

      Constructors

      Instantiates a new file object.

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int compareTo(FileObject o) 
      boolean equals(Object o) 
      boolean exists()
      Does the file exist?
      boolean existsNoMeta()
      Returns the flag without checking the disc.
      It also checks the size and time stamp, if they're above zero then the file exists.

      Gets the file object stored in 'this'.

      Gets the folder object containing this file.

      Gets the size of the file.
      This method does NOT reads from disc.

      This method does NOT read from disc.

      Gets the size as a string, appending 'KiB', 'MiB', ...

      Gets the time stamp in milliseconds since 1970.
      This method reads from disc.

      Gets the time stamp in milliseconds since 1970.
      This method does NOT read from disc.
      String getTimeString()
      Gets the time stamp as a string.
      void readMetaData()
      Updates file properties from disc.
      void setSize(long size)
      Sets the size of the file.
      Useful for creating an object for non-existing, or old representation of files.

      • exists

        public boolean exists()
        Does the file exist?
        Returns:
        true, if it exists.

      • existsNoMeta

        public boolean existsNoMeta()
        Returns the flag without checking the disc.
        It also checks the size and time stamp, if they're above zero then the file exists.
        Returns:
        true, if the the flag is true.
